articles.description: Listen to BBC radio coverage and follow live text commentary as Tottenham face Arsenal, plus two more games in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League: Build-up as Tottenham host Arsenal

articles.description: Listen on BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra and follow text commentary as Bristol City host Manchester City in the Women's Super League.
articles.title: WSL: Build-up as bottom side Bristol City host Manchester City

articles.description: Erling Haaland marked his return with a goal as Manchester City kept up the pressure on Arsenal with victory over Nottingham Forest.
articles.title: Haaland scores as Man City beat Forest

articles.description: Arsenal narrowly beat rivals Tottenham to go four points clear at the top of the Premier League.
articles.title: Arsenal survive Spurs rally to go four points clear

articles.description: LeBron James scores 30 points to help the LA Lakers beat the Denver Nuggets and keep their Western Conference first-round play-off hopes alive.
articles.title: NBA: LeBron James helps LA Lakers beat Denver Nuggets to keep Western Conference play-off series hopes alive

articles.description: Travis Clayton, an English rugby union winger playing in the eighth tier of domestic rugby, is selected by the Buffalo Bills in the final round of the NFL Draft.
articles.title: NFL Draft day three: Buffalo Bills pick rugby player Travis Clayton

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Dundee vs Celtic in the Scottish Premiership
articles.title: Dundee vs Celtic: Scottish Premiership - BBC Sport

articles.description: England all-rounder Will Jacks smashed an unbeaten century off just 41 balls to help Royal Challengers Bangalore beat Gujarat Titans by nine wickets in the IPL.
articles.title: IPL 2024 results: Will Jacks hits unbeaten century as Royal Challengers Bangalore beat Gujarat Titans

articles.description: Seven-time world champion Ronnie O'Sullivan makes a strong start to his last-16 match against Wales' Ryan Day.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship: Ronnie O'Sullivan leads Ryan Day in last 16

articles.description: Defending champion Carlos Alcaraz cruises past Thiago Seyboth Wild to reach the last 16 of the Madrid Open.
articles.title: Madrid Open: Carlos Alcaraz cruises past Thiago Seyboth Wild to reach last 16
